attributes.action: U-TURN DECISION ON LEEDS TROLLEY BUSES AND USE THE MONEY TO SAVE THE CHILDRENS HEART UNIT AT LEEDS GENERAL INFIRMARY
attributes.additional_details: Please re-think the decision to spend £250 million on Leeds Trolley Bus project and use the money to save the Childrens Heart Unit at Leeds General Infirmary. This is a blatant reminder of how the Government has got its priorities wrong.

rejection.details: There are petitions on both the Leeds trolleybus and on the heart unit.
